project.description: First test level for PS release. If this passes, PS_TRUNK will be marked with purple star

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
svn export --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_T_PS_TOOLS/ReserveItPy/trunk/ ReserveIt
#echo "Starting Serial Port loggers" #ssh -o ConnectTimeout=120 hwr@192.168.255.87 -i /home/psci/.ssh/hwr_id_rsa "sudo logrotate -f /etc/logrotate.d/conserver-server" #ssh -o ConnectTimeout=120 hwr@192.168.255.87 -i /home/psci/.ssh/hwr_id_rsa "sudo rm /var/log/conserver/*.gz"
echo "properties = { 'server_ip_address':'10.140.19.16'," > ReserveIt/Properties.py echo " 'server_port':'59108'," >> ReserveIt/Properties.py echo " 'own_name':'LRC_STARTUP_${branch}}'," >> ReserveIt/Properties.py echo " 'subnet':'192.168.255'}" >> ReserveIt/Properties.py sleep 5
python ReserveIt/ReserveItClient.py -t $test_env Reserve || exit 1 python ReserveIt/ReserveItClient.py -t $test_env Off
python ReserveIt/ReserveItClient.py -t $test_env --timeout 240 On Connect || exit 1

#!/bin/sh mkdir -p /home/psci/jenkins/workspace/PS_StartupTest_LRC_LOOP/console_logs
#no swdl if this is set export execute_tests_only=no
export branch=HZSCM_TEST export ip=192.168.255.1
#Get a right ECL if [ -d ECL ];then rm -fr ECL fi if [ "$execute_tests_only" != "yes" ]; then svn export --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert --force https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_SCM_PS/ECL/$branch/ECL_HWAPI -r $ECL_REVISION ECL echo ecl revision $ECL_REVISION svn info --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_SCM_PS/ECL/$branch/ECL_HWAPI -r $ECL_REVISION | egrep -v 'Repo|Revi|Text Last|Path' > ECL_revision_info.txt fi
svn export --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert --force https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_T_PS_TOOLS/nibbles/branches/filelogger/trunk/bin/nibbles_static svn export --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert --force https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/LRC_SC_UPHWAPI/$branch/trunk/C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/TestScripts/Utils ./testdir/Utils
cd $WORKSPACE
svn export --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert --force https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_SCM_PS/branches/ps_rel_ci/jenkins/scripts_lrc/PS_CI_Startup_test_LRC_execute.sh svn export --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_SCM_PS/branches/ps_rel_ci/jenkins/scripts_lrc/fetch_lrc_logs.sh chmod -R 777 *
$WORKSPACE/PS_CI_Startup_test_LRC_execute.sh; let test_result=$?
cp $WORKSPACE/*.log $WORKSPACE/testdir/results cp $WORKSPACE/*.tgz $WORKSPACE/testdir/results
#Make a parameter file echo ECL_REVISION=$ECL_REVISION > param_file
exit $test_result
